text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Who's the star of the show?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan's Friends
text_block_list.text: Tosen Jordan!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Who do you stan?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan's Friends
text_block_list.text: Tosen Jordan!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Aaaand... What're the trending words<n>of the day?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan's Friends
text_block_list.text: Congratulations on getting into<n>Tracen, Jordan!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, thank you! ☆

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Ding.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
All done. I'll upload this to UmaTok...<n>later. Right now, I
wanna dig into this<n>burger!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan's Friend A
text_block_list.text: Back to off-camera Jordan again, I<n>see.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Oh, come on. You know my mom<n>hates it when I eat junk
food. And I'm<n>high-key starving. ...Whoa, what's<n>with
those nails?! Absolute slay!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan's Friend A
text_block_list.text:
I know, right? This salon only charges<n>1,500 yen to first-time
visitors. I got a<n>coupon to give to a friend, so here.<n>
Congrats on getting into Tracen.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, you shouldn't have... But I'm<n>glad you did. Love you,
bestie.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan's Friend A
text_block_list.text:
Love you too! Don't let Tracen take<n>away your cute vibes,
Jordan.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan's Friend B
text_block_list.text:
For real though, you're breaking up<n>the dream team here...
You sure we<n>can't talk you out of going?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Hey, you know how hard I worked toget into this school. Even the teachsaid something nice about me for once.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan's Friend A
text_block_list.text:
Facts. He was totes shocked. But<n>well, I get it. You're not
exactly, like,<n>the brightest bulb in the box.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan's Friend A
text_block_list.text:
Seriously, how many times did you<n>accidentally throw out
your report<n>card? Or the sports festival signs?<n>You were
practically writing a new<n>apology every month.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Hey, it wasn't every month. Itwas every other month!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan's Friend B
text_block_list.text:
That's still a lot! I'm weak!<n>...Anyway, we're happy for you.
You<n>better eat it at Tracen, okay? We'll be<n>cheering from
the stands.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Yeah, yeah, thanks... And I will. I mean<n>it.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: I mean, this is Tracen, right? Theyshould be able to turn even meinto a star.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Several months later...

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
(This is it, Jordan. You've gotta win...<n>Another loss would be
so cringe. Like,<n>for real.)

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
(Pay attention during the start, and get<n>into a good position.
After that... Keep<n>your pacing in mind!)

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Inhale... Phew... I've got this!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In search of a racer to train, I decide<n>to check out the
scrimmages. There, I<n>hear the other trainers talking about<n>
one particular Umamusume.

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Wait, isn't that Tosen Jordan? I heard<n>she hurt her toenail
and couldn't run.<n>Is she okay?

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
She might be recovered, but that<n>doesn't mean it's not
going to<n>happen again. From what I've heard,<n>she's
already reinjured herself a few<n>times now.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Still... At least she hasn't given up. I<n>saw her training
yesterday, and she<n>was giving it her all... Though the dead<n>
time did set her back a bit.
choice_data_list: (Tosen Jordan, huh... I wonder what she's like.)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As their whispered conversation<n>worms its way into my
ears, I turn my<n>attention to the track.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: The racers have taken their<n>positions... And they're off!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
(Wh-why do my legs feel so wobbly?<n>I need steady
movements! Steady!)

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: (...I can't! The hell's going on?<n>Why's my running so sus?)

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff... No!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The leading racers have rounded the<n>fourth corner and are
headed into the<n>final stretch! They're quite a ways<n>from
the back of the pack!

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Is Jordan all right? She looks almost...<n>sluggish. She's really
trailing behind<n>the other racers.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Tosen Jordan's lackluster<n>performance ironically draws all
eyes<n>to her. She finishes in last place, far<n>behind the
others.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Huff... Huff... Huff...

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Hm... Did something happen, or did<n>she just... give up? She
seemed like<n>such a hard worker yesterday.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Ignoring the trainers' gossip, I decide<n>to follow Tosen
Jordan. Something<n>definitely felt off.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: ...Dammit!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: That was so! Freakin'! CRIIIINGE!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff...

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: What are you looking at?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Compared to her running, the<n>frustration she showed was
anything<n>but lackluster. Even after she runs<n>off, I can't
stop thinking about the<n>strange contradiction I just<n>
witnessed.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A few weeks after that, I begin to<n>hear rumors that Tosen
Jordan is<n>avoiding races.
